features.GSAT: 7A is the 35th Indian Communication satellite built by ISRO. GSAT-7A Spacecraft is configured on ISRO’s standard I-2000 Kg (I-2K) Bus. The Satellite is built to provide communication capability to the users in Ku-band over the Indian region. प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Communication निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Communication More Details GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission GSAT-7A GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission Gallery Launch Kit PDF - 3.58 MB GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission PDF - 3.58 MB GSLV-F11 Curtain Raiser Video (English) GSLV-F11 Curtain Raiser Video (Hindi) GSLV-F11 Lift-off and Onboard Camera View More Details GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission GSAT-7A GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission Gallery Launch Kit PDF - 3.58 MB GSLV-F11 / GSAT-7A Mission PDF - 3.58 MB GSLV-F11 Curtain Raiser Video (English) GSLV-F11 Curtain Raiser Video (Hindi) GSLV-F11 Lift-off and Onboard Camera View
